'''Nahida''' is a playable [[Dendro]] [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

She is the vessel of [[Lesser Lord Kusanali|Buer]], as [[Lesser Lord Kusanali]],<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The Empty Illusions of the Sabzeruz Festival}}</ref> the current Dendro Archon. Having been freed from her extensive confinement in the [[Sanctuary of Surasthana]], she now strives to have a stronger presence in [[Sumeru]].
